trans-unit.source: Enables the System Restore feature on the specified file system drive.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的文件系统驱动器上启用系统还原功能。

trans-unit.source: The Enable-ComputerRestore cmdlet turns on the System Restore feature on one or more file system drives.
trans-unit.target: Enable-ComputerRestore cmdlet 在一个或多个文件系统驱动器上打开系统还原功能。

trans-unit.source: As a result, you can use tools, such as the Restore-Computer cmdlet, to restore the computer to a previous state.
trans-unit.target: 因此，可以使用工具（如 Restore-Computer cmdlet）将计算机还原到先前的状态。

trans-unit.source: By default, System Restore is enabled on all eligible drives, but you can disable it, such as by using the Disable-ComputerRestore cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，系统还原在符合条件的所有驱动器上都处于启用状态，不过你可以禁用系统还原，例如使用 Disable-ComputerRestore cmdlet 来禁用。

trans-unit.source: To enable (or re-enable) System Restore on any drive, it must be enabled on the system drive, either first or concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 若要在任何驱动器上启用（或重新启用）系统还原，则必须首先或同时在系统驱动器上启用系统还原。

trans-unit.source: To find the state of System Restore for each drive, use Rstrui.exe.
trans-unit.target: 若要查找每个驱动器的系统还原状态，请使用 Rstrui.exe。

trans-unit.source: System restore points and the ComputerRestore cmdlets are supported only on client operating systems, such as Windows 7, Windows Vista, and Windows XP.
trans-unit.target: 系统还原点和 ComputerRestore cmdlet 仅在客户端操作系统（例如 Windows 7、Windows Vista 和 Windows XP）上受支持。

trans-unit.source: This command enables System Restore on the C: drive of the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令在本地计算机的 C: 驱动器上启用系统还原。

trans-unit.source: This command enables System Restore on the C: and D: drives of the local computer.
trans-unit.target: 此命令在本地计算机的 C: 和 D: 驱动器上启用系统还原。

trans-unit.source: Enter one or more file system drive letters, each followed by a colon and a backslash and enclosed in quotation marks, such as "C:\" or "D:\".
trans-unit.target: 输入一个或多个文件系统驱动器号，每跟有冒号和反斜杠和用引号括起来，如"c:\" 或"d:\"。

trans-unit.source: You cannot use this cmdlet to enable System Restore on a remote network drive, even if the drive is mapped to the local computer, and you cannot enable System Restore on drives that are not eligible for System Restore, such as external drives.
trans-unit.target: 无法使用此 cmdlet 在远程网络驱动器上启用系统还原，即使该驱动器映射到本地计算机也是如此，并且无法在不符合系统还原条件的驱动器（如外部驱动器）上启用系统还原。

trans-unit.source: To enable System Restore on any drive, System Restore must be enabled on the system drive, either before or concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 若要在任何驱动器上启用系统还原，则必须首先或同时在系统驱动器上启用系统还原。

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。
有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe objects to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 不能通过管道将对象传递给此 cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 将不生成任何输出。

trans-unit.source: To run an Enable-ComputerRestore command on Windows Vista and later versions of Windows, open Windows PowerShell with the "Run as administrator" option.
trans-unit.target: 若要在 Windows Vista 以及更高版本的 Windows 上运行 Enable-ComputerRestore 命令，请使用“以管理员身份运行”选项打开 Windows PowerShell。

trans-unit.source: To find the file system drives that are eligible for system restore, in System in Control Panel, see the System Protection tab.
trans-unit.target: 若要查找符合系统还原条件的文件系统驱动器，请在“控制面板”中查看“系统”中的“系统保护”选项卡。

trans-unit.source: To open this tab in Windows PowerShell, type "SystemPropertiesProtection".
trans-unit.target: 若要在 Windows PowerShell 中打开此选项卡，请键入“SystemPropertiesProtection”。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet uses the Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) SystemRestore class.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 使用 Windows Management Instrumentation (WMI) SystemRestore 类。
